text: Thank you guys again for coming to the meet today. Really appreciate it and the turn out was way better then expected. It was just right  not too much and not too little~ Most importantly  you guys respected the rules to not pop and bang (ofc the lil pops when u guys leave was tbh appreciated :3) I'm glad the feedbacks were all positive and many of yall broke your car meet virgin today at the scd meet! Haha. So many amazing cars came by  and car gods that I look up to came by as well. Much loves. ❤️And lastly  I would like to apologise for the admins to just leave abruptly due to certain reasons  so we don't get all of you into trouble.However  let's all give some credits to the entire admin team to literally stand at the gantry and walking around with the walkies to guide the way for some of you guys. And thank you for the entire scd team to make the meet happen  even if yall just came for awhile. ☺️❤️There's always next time till we all meet again! Just keep a look out in the chat  we have mini meets anytime anyday~Goodnight. ❤️
